nodes.text: A male individual was the husband of the human Baako Moradi, the brother of Resistance spy Vi Moradi. The couple lived together on the moon Pantora. During a mission on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY, while Vi thought—albeit incorrectly—that she would die from a poison dart, the spy thought of Baako and his husband, noting to herself that she had yet to meet the latter.
The husband of Baako Moradi was mentioned in the 2019 novel Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire, written by Delilah S. Dawson.
